function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Organizations unable to meet the basic physiological needs of their workforce, including health and safety, job security, and financial stress.","Impact":"Increased risk of employee health issues, reduced productivity, and higher turnover rates.","Mitigation":"Implementing health and safety protocols, providing job security, and offering financial support and resources.","Technologies":"Health monitoring technologies, remote work tools, and financial management software.","People":"Employees, workforce, organizational leaders","Owner":"Organizational leaders, HR department"},{"Description":"Lack of motivation and recognition due to focus on basic physiological needs.","Impact":"Decreased morale, lower productivity, and reduced employee engagement.","Mitigation":"Implementing recognition programs, boosting team morale, and providing emotional support.","Technologies":"Employee recognition platforms, team collaboration tools, and mental health support apps.","People":"Employees, organizational leaders","Owner":"Organizational leaders, HR department"}]}
